original_title: Joe Blitman's Oh, You Beautiful Doll!
overview: In this fabulous full-color presentation Barbie expert Joe Blitman shares his vast knowledge of the nuts and bolts of collecting all things Barbie, including which dolls to buy, how to shop at a doll show, how to identify specific dolls and how to clean clothes or do repairs if a doll is damaged.
title: Joe Blitman's Oh, You Beautiful Doll!
